QuickShrink Extension: Effortless URL Shortening üöÄ

QuickShrink Extension is a simple and efficient tool for shortening URLs. Designed for ease of use, QuickShrink allows you to quickly convert long URLs into short, manageable links.

Why Install QuickShrink?

- Quick URL Shortening ‚ö°: Instantly shorten long URLs into concise, shareable links with just one click.
- User-Friendly Interface üñ•Ô∏è: Simply input the URL you want to shorten, click the arrow button, and get your shortened link immediately.

Simplify your link management today with QuickShrink!

How to Use QuickShrink üìñ?

 Shorten a URL:
    - Enter the URL you want to shorten in the input field.
    - Click the arrow button to shorten the link.
    - Your shortened URL will be displayed.

FAQ ‚ùì

- Q: How secure are the shortened URLs?
  - A: QuickShrink ensures your links are safely shortened and managed.

- Q: Is there a limit to the number of URLs I can shorten?
  - A: No, QuickShrink API‚Ñ¢Ô∏è allows you to shorten an unlimited number of URLs. However, the QuickShrink Extension can only store a limited number of urls (limit set due to Chrome storage size) and only display 3 shortened URLs at a time.

- Q: Can I track the usage of my shortened URLs?
  - A: Currently, QuickShrink focuses on providing a simple shortening service without tracking capabilities.

- Q: Are the shortened URLs permanent?
  - A: Yes, once a URL is shortened, it will remain active indefinitely unless deleted.

- Q: Does QuickShrink support custom short links?
  - A: At this time, QuickShrink Extension does not support custom short links but this feature will be added soon.
